text: kāntāvangē mahar san̆dahan nokara hō (vivāha kara) ovunva oba ḷaṁ novī hō (siṭiyadī) talāk kīvahot vuvada, oba kerehi varadak næta. ehet ovunṭa yam kisivak dī prayōjanayak at kara denu. dhanavatā tama tatvayaṭa sarilana ākārayaṭada, duppatā tama śakti pamaṇinda gauravaṇīya andaminda (ovunṭa labā dī prayōjanayak at kara dīma) hon̆da aya kerehi æti yutukamaki
